entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:09 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 02:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 36.
